tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had been looking for a good gynecologist for the past 6 months and after meeting a few doctors I finally found Dr.Anuradha. I am so happy to find a doctor who listened to me and understood my problems. She is knowledgeable and kind. Although she is an hour away from me, I have no intention of changing the gynecologist. 
Office staff is also very friendly, especially Liya. 
Aanya clinic is extremely clean and beautifully done.  I was surprised to see how well it‚Äôs kept and managed.
reply_text:
Thank you so much Geetanjali
Such a pleasure to have a lovely person like you as a client

review: I had a video consultation with Dr. Anuradha for my PCOS treatment. She is punctual, a good listener and an effective evaluator and has provided me with very helpful information.
